name: Moo-nshot BETA
description:
GAME MUST BE FULLSCREENED FOR UI AND PHYSICS TO WORK PROPERLY

NOTE: This is a very, very, VERY prototype version of a game that will ultimately be submitted to the Game Off 2020 Jam. I posted this so that my very nice friends can give it a shot and provide feedback I can use to make the design more engaging as I work on all the graphics, sound, UI, etc. 

Thanks for playing guys! Be as mean as possible for feedback!
